folder: Douglas Road & Emerson Drive, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Douglas Road, north side, between Emerson Drive and Milden Ave., showing the Philosopher's Retreat, a log cabin built by direction of C.G. Kolff on his property. It was destroyed by fire in 1917. For additional data see "The New York Times", February 4, 1917, section 3, page 4.

November 24, 1910.
By Wm. T. Davis through P.L. Sperr.

(2)
A view from the opposite direction.

November 24, 1910.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.

(3)
An additional view at a later date.

August 31, 1913.
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr.

folder: Douglas Road & Emerson Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
101 Douglas Road, east side, at Emerson Avenue, showing the Gordon residence.

May 14, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Dogwood blossoms at the Gordon home.

May 14, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

text:
Douglas Road; north side, west of Emerson Drive, showing the Webster residence.

August 7, 1932.
